name: Vampire Farm
description:
The game was made entirely in pygame in one week (11/8 - 17/8); it was my first 'complete game', and it's still in a very early development state, it's only a rushed version for Low Rez Jam 2019. I'll release a more polished code in the future.

Code by Catarina Pereira, heavily helped by Pedro Caetano.
Art by Pedro Caetano.
